title: 49: Tantra Talk
itunes:title: 49: Tantra Talk
description:
The Broads sit down with the amazing tantric relationship coach, Kamali Minter. They discuss tantra, its deeper meaning, meditation practices for orgasm, transformation of self and sensuality, and much more.
You can follow Kamali at @weareaspaceforlove and find out more about her workshops and blog at www.spaceforlove.com
Books that Kamali discussed: 
“Tantric Orgasm for Women” by Diana Richardson
“Come As You Are” by Emily Nagoski 
“The Way of the Superior Man” by David Deida
Chatty Broads was recorded and produced @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com
*** STAMPS.COM: For a 4-week trial PLUS free postage AND a digital scale go to Stamps.com, click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY.
*** MYRO: Visit mymyro.com/CHATTY and use promo code: CHATTY for 50% off your first order!
*** CLUTTER: Get $50 off your first month when you sign up at CLUTTER.com/CHATTY
